price: Ni vyake viliomo mbinguni na viliomo katika ardhi. Na hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye kujitosha na Mwenye kusifiwa.
arabic: لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ
footnotes: Kila kiliomo mbinguni na katika ardhi ni chake Yeye, na kinamtumikia Yeye peke yake, na anakiendesha kama apendavyo. Na Yeye hawahitajii waja wake, bali wao ndio wanao mhitajia Yeye. Na Yeye ndiye anaye stahiki peke yake kuhimidiwa na kusifiwa na viumbe vyote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
